name: Credit spread risk (CSR) non-securitisation risk factor for standardised approach
description:
Delta CSR non-securitisation: the CSR non-securitisation delta risk factors are defned along two dimensions:
(a) the relevant issuer credit spread curves (bond and CDS); and 
(b) the following tenors: 0.5 years, 1 year, 3 years, 5 years and 10 years.
